WorkItem.ClosedComment: The first parameter really shouldn't be considered to be optional -- that behavior only works because 'undefined' gets converted to '0'. Note that the Mozilla Developer Network considers 'start' to be required: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Array/slice
WorkItem.Description:
The slice method of an array supports a parameter less version -> see

http://www.w3schools.com/jsref/jsref_slice_array.asp

"The slice() method returns the selected elements in an array, as a new array object."

It is however not supported by typescript.
